amendment.description: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit funds from being used to enforce the zero-tolerance prosecution policy at the Department of Justice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Ms. Escobar.
